thread.title: The Vamps on their new album Wake Up: 'There's a surprise rap collaboration' - Music
thread.title_full: The Vamps on their new album Wake Up: 'There's a surprise rap collaboration' - Music News - Digital Spy

author: Amy Davidson
title: The Vamps on their new album Wake Up: 'There's a surprise rap collaboration' - Music
text: The Vamps are pulling out all the stops for their new album Wake Up. First of all they recruited Brooklyn Beckham to scale some rooftops for the title track's music video, and now they've revealed there's also a mystery rapper getting in on the action. function onTemplateLoaded(experienceID) { bcExp = brightcove.getExperience(experienceID); modVP = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.VIDEO_PLAYER); modExp = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.EXPERIENCE); modCon = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.CONTENT); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.BEGIN, onVideoStart); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.STOP, onVideoStop); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.PROGRESS, onVideoProgress); } #_containermyExperience4542755241001 { height: 100%; } // InSkin integration parameters: InSkinParams['myInSkin14542755241001'] = { 'srv_SectionID': '', 'srv_SectionIDPlay': '123757', 'srv_Keywords': '', 'plr_ContentID': 'myExperience4542755241001', 'plr_ContentType': 'BRIGHTCOVE3', 'plr_ContentW': 558, 'plr_ContentH': 314, 'plr_NoSkinContentResize': true, 'plr_NoSkinContentW': 618, 'plr_NoSkinContentH': 348, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinResize': true, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinW': 618, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinH': 348, 'plr_ResizeOnHideSkin': true, 'plr_HideSkinOnExternalAd': 'all', 'plr_ShowSkinAfterExternalAd': true, 'cnt_SmartPlayer': true }; // create the InSkin object: var InSkinObject4542755241001 = new InSkin.Base('myInSkin14542755241001'); brightcove.createExperiences(); if (!navigator.userAgent.match(/Android/i)) { InSkinObject4542755241001.init(); ai_type="video"; } Digital Spy spoke to the group, who remained tight-lipped about the featured artist but promised it will "surprise people"."We can't tell you but it's a male... It's a rap kind of thing," Brad of the group teased. "The collaboration will be the biggest surprise but it's also one of our favourite things we've ever done in The Vamps and it's come out really well and it just worked on the song."The Vamps' new single 'Wake Up' is out now while the album of the same name will follow on November 27.
